apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji, as seen on Apple devices, depicts a tender kiss between two individuals with distinct skin tones: medium-light and dark. Apple's design language imbues the figures with soft, rounded features and subtle, realistic lighting, highlighting their gentle embrace. The smooth gradients and subtle blush on their cheeks convey affection and intimacy, making it an ideal choice to express love, passion, or a sweet gesture in messages sent from Apple devices.
